creator: jamie@letual.net
text:
Created attachment 26410
Changed appender to create a TextMessage instead of an ObjectMessage

This is a patch to the JMSQueueAppender in contrib/Jamie Tsao
The code in the contrib directory doesn't work with the TIBCO implentation of the API. I haven't looked yet at the JMS specification, but it seemed reasonable to change the message type from ObjectMessage to TextMessage.

I don't know what the exit criteria for unit testing this appender, what the reasonable set of message brokers to test on might be. 
If anyone has an opinion, I would be glad to unit test on different platforms.
